restoration_instructions.full_restore: To restore the entire database: supabase db reset && psql -h localhost -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres -f SUPABASE_BACKUP_DATABASE/full_backup.sql
restoration_instructions.schema_only: To restore only the schema: psql -h localhost -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres -f SUPABASE_BACKUP_DATABASE/schema_backup.sql
restoration_instructions.data_only: To restore only the data: psql -h localhost -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres -f SUPABASE_BACKUP_DATABASE/data_backup.sql
restoration_instructions.functions_only: To restore only the functions: psql -h localhost -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres -f SUPABASE_BACKUP_DATABASE/functions_backup.sql
restoration_instructions.rls_policies: To restore RLS policies: psql -h localhost -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres -f SUPABASE_BACKUP_DATABASE/rls_policies_backup.sql
